docs.abstract: Cathy Nonas letter on March 23 Jane Brody Personal Health column about low-carb diets suggests that managing weight is about controlling calories and portions and eating variety of naturally healthy foods (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re the Personal Health column ''Sane Weight Loss in a Carb-Obsessed World: High Fiber and Low Fat'' (March 23): Not too long ago, food manufacturers tried to accommodate America's diet demands by producing an array of extremely low-fat products. We ate them and as a result became a heavier nation. Now we're in the middle of another diet craze, and manufacturers are plying us with low-carb foods.
